titles.title: I Can Run Through A Troop

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I can run through a troop, and leap over a wall,
Hallelujah,
With His strength and His sword the battle is won,
Hallelujah,
He's the rock of my salvation,
There is no more condemnation,
I can run through a troop and leap over a wall,
Hallelujah.
